## PropertyTrack.mixState() method

Blend two states into a new state using a weight.

**Signature:**

```typescript
mixState(a: PropertyValue, b: PropertyValue, t: number): PropertyValue;
```

</td></tr>

</td><td>

[PropertyValue](doc/markdown/./scene.propertyvalue.md)


</td><td>

Second state.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

t


</td><td>

number


</td><td>

Blend weight in \[0, 1<!-- -->\]<!-- -->, where 0 yields `a` and 1 yields `b`<!-- -->.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

[PropertyValue](doc/markdown/./scene.propertyvalue.md)
